<div id="content_main_columnControl_29">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_32" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_14">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="firstcare-medical"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            FirstCare Plus Medical Insurance
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_32" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>What will be the coverage if no pre-authorisation is obtained for inpatient claims?<br> <br> </strong><span style="font-family: "HSBC Univers Next", "HSBC Neue Helvetica", "sans-serif"; font-size: 1rem; font-style: normal; font-weight: 400; background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0);">Other than hospitalisation in the public ward of a public hospital in Hong Kong and/or due to accident and emergency, the coverage will be 0% for Basic or Saver Plan and 80% for Standard, Enhanced or Top Plan if no pre-authorisation is obtained.</span></p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_11" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_13" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-741907331__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-741907331__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Other FirstCare Plus Medical Insurance FAQs </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-741907331__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_30">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_33" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_33" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Why is pre-authorisation important?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Pre-authorisation is recommended for planned medical treatments to allow you to be prepared if your treatment costs exceed the benefit limits under your policy and minimise unexpected medical expenses.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>If I feel unwell and my doctor refers me to a hospital for further investigation, will this be covered by the policy?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The policy doesn't cover medical expenses arising from hospitalisation primarily for investigation or physiotherapy. For it to be an eligible claim, you must receive therapeutic treatment during the hospitalisation in addition to the investigation.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong> </strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Does overseas inpatient coverage apply to emergencies only? What happens if I emigrate to another country or territory?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Treatments within the covered area are covered under hospitalisation and surgical benefits. The coverage is intended for occasional overseas visits, where different countries or territories may have different treatment costs. If you emigrate to another country or territory, you may need to see if the coverage is still adequate for you, and this is likely to depend on the country or territory you reside. As long as the insured person doesn't immigrate to US, Japan and/or any sanctioned countries or territories, the benefits under the policy shall be covered.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Is there any medical examination required prior to application?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">No. You only need to complete the health declaration section of the application form for our further handling.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Do I need to settle the medical bill first and file a claim later if I am hospitalised out of AXA Signature Network?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If the treatment is conducted out of the Network, you will need to settle the medical bill first and submit claims later. Please refer to the FirstCare Plus Medical Insurance Insert for the reimbursement level available to each plan option.<br> <strong></strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How can I get the latest designated Mainland China hospitals list?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may check the latest designated <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/help/hospital-list.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Mainland China hospital list</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Mainland China hospital list  This link will open in a new window</span></a> at HSBC website or call AXA Customer Care Hotline on <a href="tel:85228678678" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2867 8678</a>, or Worldwide Emergency and Medical Helpline on <a href="tel:85228620199" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2862 0199</a>. As the designated Mainland China hospitals list may change from time to time, you are advised to confirm the availability of your selected hospital prior to admission.<br></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>What do I need to do to get reimbursement after being discharged from a public hospital?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please send the claim form, discharge summary containing the specific diagnosis and operation plus the original receipt to us within 90 days from the date of discharge from the public hospital. If the information submitted is not adequate for us to determine the eligibility of the claim, we may ask you to provide additional information, and all fees arising from the additional information shall be at your own expenses. Please note that the Policy will not cover any expenses arising from confinement in the private ward of public hospitals in Hong Kong.<br></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Do I need to renew the Policy before it expires each year? What if I decide to cancel the Policy?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">A renewal notice will be sent to you about 45 calendar days before expiry of current policy term. If you decide not to renew the Policy, you will need to inform us in writing at least 10 business days before Policy expires, or the Policy will be renewed automatically.<br></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How long must I stay in the hospital for a claim to be eligible?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">It depends on the nature of the hospital treatment. You are required to register as an inpatient in the hospital for at least 6 consecutive hours for medically necessary treatment. No minimum period is required for confinement in connection with any emergency treatment in a hospital as a result of an emergency for the performance of a medically necessary treatment.<br></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Will I be covered if I’m hospitalised for rehabilitation purposes?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Similar to most policies in the market, hospitalisation for rehabilitation purpose is not covered by the Policy.</p>
</div></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

    <div class="anchor" id="cancer-care-insurance-plan"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Cancer Care Insurance Plan
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_34" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <h3><strong>Is medical check-up required?</strong><br> </h3> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Application for Cancer Care is easy with no medical check-up is required.</p>
</div></div>

</div></div>

            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_12" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_14" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1099219624__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1099219624__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Other Cancer Care Insurance Plan FAQs </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1099219624__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_32">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_35" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_35" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Is my family member entitled to be covered under the same benefit level as I am?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes. The benefit level of your family member can be the same as or lower than your selected benefit level. For example, if you select Plan B - Essential, your family member can select either Plan B - Essential or Plan A - Basic.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Will I be guaranteed to renew my policy even if I have made a claim? Is the premium guaranteed unchanged?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your policy is renewable up to 79 years old at each policy anniversary upon payment of premium on or before the premium due date and subject to the availability of the policy.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">However, the premium rates are not guaranteed. Premium will be adjusted based on the attained age of the insured person on each policy anniversary. AXA reserves the right to revise the benefits, review and adjust the premium rates upon policy renewal.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Do I need to renew my policy before the policy anniversary each year? What if I decide to cancel the policy?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">A renewal notice will be sent to you 45 days before the policy anniversary. If you decide not to renew the policy, you will need to inform us at least 30 days before the policy anniversary, or the policy will be renewed automatically for another year subject to the payment of the renewal premiums before the due date as determined by us.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Is there any waiting period for Cancer Care?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, the waiting period is 90 days from the original commencement date of the policy or the effective date of last reinstatement (whichever is later). All benefits shall not be payable at any time under the policy for any cancer, carcinoma-in-situ and early stage cancer, diagnosed or with the signs or symptoms of which first occurred within the waiting period.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"></p><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How can I manage my policy?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can call 2867 8678 should you have any queries about your policy, or manage your policy at ease by e-Policy Servicing after logging on to HSBC Internet Banking if you are an HSBC internet banking customer. This online service provides you with 24-hour access to your policy details and allows you to submit policy service requests without hassle.</p>
<p></p>

</div></div>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_34">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_37" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_16">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="income-goal-insurance-plan"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Income Goal Insurance Plan
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_36" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <h3><strong>During the annuity period, is the Monthly Annuity Payment guaranteed? If I withdraw any accumulated dividends and interest under my policy during the policy term, how does this affect my Monthly Non-guaranteed Annuity Payment portion?</strong><br> </h3> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Monthly Annuity Payment consists of Monthly Guaranteed Annuity Payment plus Monthly Non-guaranteed Annuity Payment.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Monthly Non-guaranteed Annuity Payment is mainly derived from the accumulated dividends and interest and projected dividends and interest. Any adjustment affecting the dividends and interest and Special Bonus, which may include but not limited to dividend and interest withdrawals, change of dividend scale or Special Bonus scale or applicable interest rate on the accumulated dividends and interest balance, will trigger re-calculation of the Monthly Non-guaranteed Annuity Payment.<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_15" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_15" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1181941289__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1181941289__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Other Income Goal Insurance Plan FAQs </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1181941289__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_35">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_38" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_37" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How is Special Bonus different from dividends?</strong><br>
</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Special Bonus and dividends are the non-guaranteed amounts to be declared by the Company at its absolute discretion.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Dividends, if any, are declared and credited to the policy on each policy anniversary throughout the policy term and the amount of the dividends will not change once declared.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Special Bonus, if any, is declared by the Company at the commencement of the annuity period. During the accumulation period, the Company will update you the amount of the Special Bonus, if any, on the annual statement of each policy anniversary. Such amounts as shown on the annual statement(s) may be higher or lower than those illustrated on the earlier annual statement(s) issued during the accumulation period as the actual amount of Special Bonus, if any, is only declared and becomes payable at the commencement of the annuity period.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>What happens if I miss a premium payment?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">There is a 30-day grace period for premium payments that are due. If you cannot make the payment by the end of the grace period and the sum of the guaranteed cash value and accumulated dividends and interest, if any, calculated as at the date immediately preceding the due date of the relevant unpaid premium is sufficient to pay the relevant unpaid premium, an automatic premium loan equivalent to the amount of the unpaid premium will be granted and applied to pay such premium. Interest will apply on the principal of all policy loans (including automatic premium loan) made under the policy and you will be advised of such rate of interest at that time, which can be adjusted by the company from time to time. Please note that the Monthly Annuity Payment will only be paid on each monthiversary during the annuity period provided that all premiums are paid when due during the premium payment period.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How much can I get back if I surrender the policy?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you surrender the policy at any time during the accumulation period, you will receive the surrender value of the policy, which is equal to the sum of the guaranteed cash value, accumulated dividends and interest (if any), and Special Bonus<a><sup>2</sup></a> (if any), less indebtedness (if any).</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you surrender the policy at any time during the annuity period, you will receive the surrender value of the policy, which is equal to the sum of the guaranteed cash value, any accumulated Monthly Annuity Payments and any accumulated dividends and interest, less indebtedness, if any.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please note that early surrender of the policy may result in you getting back a lesser amount than the total premiums you have paid into the policy.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><sup>2</sup>The amount of Special Bonus is not guaranteed and subjected to the Company's absolute discretion.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How is Income Goal Insurance Plan different from other pure savings plans? </strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Income Goal Insurance Plan is specially designed for customers who want to have an effective plan to meet their personal goals. It differs from a pure savings plan in that it includes life insurance cover throughout the policy term and provides a stream of Monthly Annuity Payments during the annuity period. In the event of the death of life insured, the total amount that we have to pay to you in the form of guaranteed monthly annuity payment (if any) together with the amount that we will pay to the beneficiary(ies) as death proceeds is at least equal to the Total Premiums Paid<a><sup>1</sup></a>.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><sup>1</sup>Total Premiums Paid refers to the total amount of premiums due under the basic plan (whether or not actually paid) as of the date of death of the life insured. Please refer to the policy for detailed terms and conditions.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How can I keep track of my plan?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You will receive an annual statement showing updated policy values. You can also contact us on 2583 8000.</p>

</div></div>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_17">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="life-plan-protection"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Goal Access Universal Life Plan (Protection)
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_38" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <h3><strong>When can I withdraw from the policy? Are there any requirements, restriction and charges involved?</strong><br> </h3> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you need money to cope with any unexpected or planned life events, for a regular premium policy, you can withdraw from the policy account after the end of the premium payment period. For a single premium policy, you can withdraw from the policy account on or after the first policy anniversary. Withdrawals are subject to (i) a Surrender Charge applicable in the first 10 policy years ranging from 1% to 45% depending on the policy year and premium payment period; (ii) a minimum amount of USD625 per withdrawal; and (iii) a minimum Account Value balance of USD2,500 after withdrawal.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Withdrawals will reduce the Account Value which may reduce the Death Benefit and increase the chance of policy lapses. The policy will lapse when the Account Value is not sufficient to cover the policy charges for 45 consecutive days.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_16" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="180844098__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="180844098__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Other Goal Access Universal Life Plan (Protection) FAQs </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="180844098__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_37">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_40" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_39" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How much can I get back if I surrender the policy?</strong><br>
</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may surrender (i.e. terminate) the policy at any time by submitting a written request in the form specified by the Company which is available at <a href="/">www.hsbc.com.hk</a>.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Upon surrender, the policy will be terminated and you will receive the Account Value minus any applicable Surrender Charge in the first 10 policy years and any outstanding charges. Due to the deduction of policy charges and Surrender Charge, the amount you get back may be significantly less than what you have paid.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Will my coverage under Goal Access Universal Life Plan (Protection) end before reaching age 99?</strong><br>
</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In order to keep the policy in force, you must pay all Planned Premiums and any supplementary benefit premiums when due and the Account Value must be sufficient to cover the policy charges. Your policy will lapse when the Account Value is not sufficient to cover policy charges for 45 consecutive days or when Planned Premium and any supplementary benefit premiums have been overdue for 65 consecutive days.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To avoid policy lapses, you should pay all Planned Premiums and any supplementary benefit premiums when due and ensure that the Account Value is sufficient to cover the policy charges. Should you fulfil the criteria mentioned above, the policy will mature at the policy anniversary at which the life insured's age next birthday is 99.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Can I pay premium into the plan anytime?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The plan consists of the following premium types: Planned Premium and Unscheduled Premium.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Planned Premium - all Planned Premium must be paid in accordance with the premium payment period selected upon policy application. The policy will lapse when the Planned Premium and any supplementary benefit premiums have been overdue for 65 consecutive days.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Planned Premium is determined according to the age and gender of the life insured, sum insured, payment term, policy currency and a variety of health and lifestyle factors.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Unscheduled Premium - you can contribute Unscheduled Premium to the policy while the policy is in force. You can choose the amount of Unscheduled Premium to contribute, subject to a minimum amount of USD625 per transaction, which may be changed by the Company from time to time. The acceptance of the Unscheduled Premium is at the Company's discretion.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Both the Planned Premium and Unscheduled Premium will be allocated to Account Value after deduction of Policy Premium Charge. Should there be supplementary benefits attached to the policy, the premiums for such supplementary benefits will also be allocated to Account Value after deduction of Policy Premium Charge.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How is Goal Access Universal Life Plan (Protection) different from other insurance plans?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Goal Access Universal Life Plan (Protection) is specially designed for customers who want to have an insurance plan to meet their protection and legacy planning needs with a high degree of flexibility. Not only it offers protection and great flexibility in growing and managing your savings, but also it allows you to adjust your sum insured to meet your changing needs over time.</p>

</div></div>

You can choose the amount of Unscheduled Premium to contribute, subject to a minimum amount of USD625 per transaction, which may be changed by the Company from time to time.     </h2>
    <div class="row">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_42" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <h3><strong>Will my mortgage insurance cover terminated immediately after I have completed all the mortgage payments or the property was sold out?</strong><br> </h3> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Following your successful application, the plan continues to provide coverage unless you notify us to cancel the policy in case your need for protection changes, for example, when the property was sold or all related mortgage payments have been settled.</p>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_43" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How can I review my mortgage balance and my plan's coverage?</strong><br>
</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can call our insurance hotline 2583 8000 or go to our branch for enquiries.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>What happens to my policy if I change my mortgage by topping up or extending the term of my mortgage?</strong><br>
</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you decide to top up or extend your mortgage, please re-assess if your coverage is sufficient and you may choose to increase the sum insured of the plan or cancel the existing plan to make another new application in order to meet your protection need.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>If the mortgage balance is lowered, should my premium payments go down as well?</strong></p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The plan is designed with level premium, so the same premium will maintain throughout the policy term with no change even when the mortgage balance is reduced. The sum insured under your policy decreases annually in accordance with policy term. The sum insured may not match with the outstanding mortgage amount as the decreasing rate of the sum insured may not be equal to the rate of your mortgage.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>If my mortgage protection policy is in joint names, are both parties required to sign on any changes to policy?</strong><br>
</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Any change to your joint named mortgage protection policy must be signed and agreed by both joint named parties.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Can I convert this plan to another life policy after my mortgage loan completed or the property was sold out?</strong><br>
</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can enjoy Conversion Privilege when the Life Insured’s Insurance Age is less than 60.Mortgage Protection Plan guarantees that you can convert the policy into a new whole life or an endowment insurance plan with no underwriting. For terms and conditions of the Conversion Privilege, please refer to the provisions for details.</p>

</div></div>

    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_49" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_45" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Are there any exclusions, such as pre-existing conditions under Preferred Care?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">After two years of coverage and four years without treatment or evidence of the pre-existing condition you can re-apply for coverage, and whether such coverage can be granted is determined by us on a case-by-case basis. Unlike most health care programmes, pre-existing conditions are not automatically excluded forever. Other standard exclusions apply, such as claims arising from acts of war/terrorism, radiation, drug abuse, illegal activities, and HIV/AIDS. This programme is specifically designed to be free from restrictive policy language – nonetheless we encourage you to discuss the policy wording with your Wealth Management Manager/ Premier Relationship Manager.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Why do I need this programme?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Critical illnesses are life threatening conditions and require advanced medical technology and expertise to achieve the most effective treatment and rapid recovery. Hospitals in the USA are leaders in critical illness treatment. Some health care programmes may offer payment for treatment abroad and will claim to allow your choice of treatment destination. However, closer review of the coverage uncover this option is usually offered under special conditions (such as temporary trips overseas, emergencies, etc). Furthermore, you may be required to make the payment yourself, then be reimbursed, sometimes for less than the full cost you incurred. Travel and accommodation costs are usually not covered, even though these can be substantial. Lastly, many health care programmes do not provide you with personalized attention to find the best treatment or assist you during the treatment process. The Preferred Care programme was designed specially to bring you personalised service and advanced treatment at top-ranked hospitals in the USA. Payment is direct, causing you no financial disruption. Furthermore, Preferred Care pays for the necessary additional services for you and a companion. This includes airfare and a generous accommodation allowance. Most importantly, you and your family have the full 24-hour support of a team of trained professionals to support you every step of the way.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Is US$2 million annual limit enough?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">According to our past experience, medical expenses normally do not exceed the annual limit of US$2 million e.g. the most expensive treatments in the USA is heart/lung transplant that could cost up to US$1 million. US$2 million should be more than adequate.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>After the treatment in the USA, will follow up service in Hong Kong be included in the coverage?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Preferred Care only covers the treatment that is arranged by PGH and incurred in an US hospital. While it does not cover the follow-up treatment costs outside of the USA, customers are not abandoned after leaving the US hospital. A full plan and coordination is provided between the US and Hong Kong doctors for follow-up care. Treatment cost in the USA, which is covered by Preferred Care, usually represents the great majority of the overall cost. You can arrange local medical insurance to cover the remaining local medical care cost which should be smaller by comparison.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Why is treatment limited to the USA?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Critical illnesses are life threatening conditions and require advanced medical technology and expertise to achieve the most effective treatment and rapid recovery. Hospitals in the USA are leaders in critical illness treatment.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_47">

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_21">
    
    

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Worldwide Elite Medical Plan
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_46" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <h3><strong>Where can I get medical treatment that is covered by Worldwide Elite Medical Plan?</strong></h3> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><br> AXA will reimburse you the costs incurred in receiving eligible medical treatments from any registered doctors<sup><a href="#*"><span aria-hidden="true">*</span><span class="visuallyhidden">* View footnote *</span></a></sup> or hospitals (including general practitioners, specialists or health professionals) worldwide.<br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_48">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">

            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_22" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_20" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1463152615__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1463152615__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Other Worldwide Elite Medical Plan FAQs </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1463152615__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_49">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_52" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_47" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How can I make sure that I am fully covered when I need hospitalisation?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">We recommend that you contact the 24-hour Worldwide Elite Customer Service Hotline to check the coverage under the policy and to obtain AXA’s necessary pre-authorisation before receiving any non-emergency in-patient or day-patient treatment.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Can I get in-patient and day-patient treatment without pre-authorisation?</strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In general yes, as long as the treatment is covered by the policy. There are specific benefits that require AXA’s pre-authorisation, and we recommend you to obtain pre-authorisation for your in-patient and day-patient treatment prior to receiving such treatment to ensure you are fully aware of your coverage under the policy.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Do I need to settle the medical bill first if I am hospitalised?</strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In case of hospitalisation under our Global Directory of Hospitals (“GDOH”), once a pre-authorisation request is approved, a Letter of Guarantee (“LOG”) will be issued to the hospital and AXA will settle the medical bill for you after you have paid the deductible amount (where applicable). In case of hospitalisation in a hospital not under our GDOH, you will have to settle the bill directly with the hospital first. Then, you can claim reimbursement from AXA less any deductible amount (where applicable) upon submission of original medical bills and required documents.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How can I get the latest Global Directory of Hospitals?</strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You may check the latest Global Directory of Hospitals at <a href="https://retailbank.hsbc.com.hk/media/2463/wemp-global-directory-of-hospitals_en.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">here</span><span class="visuallyhidden">here  This link will open in a new window</span></a> or call the Worldwide Elite Customer Service Hotline on <a href="tel:+85228678611" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2867 8611</a>. As the designated hospitals list may change from time to time, please be advised to confirm the availability of your selected hospital prior to admission.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    </div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_48" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">* <a id="*"></a>Refers to a medical practitioner who is a duly qualified in the field of western medicine registered and legally authorised in the geographical area of his practice to render western medical or surgical services but excludes the Insured Person himself, the Policyholder, anyone with the same residence as the Insured Person or who is a member of the Insured Person’s immediate family or an enterprise owned by one of the above-mentioned persons. For the avoidance of doubt, a Medical Practitioner does not include a Dental Practitioner.</p>
</div></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Document Upload
    </h2>
    <div class="row">

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_49" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <h3><strong>What is Document Upload?</strong></h3> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><br> Document Upload is a platform located in Personal Internet Banking, HSBC HK Mobile Banking app, and HSBC Public Website for customers to upload any supplementary documents for new insurance applications and to request or provide supplementary documents for policy servicing and claims.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><span class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">This service is only applicable to life insurance policies underwritten by HSBC Life (International) Limited.</span><br> </p>
</div></div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_50" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>What type of documents can I upload via the Document Upload function?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can upload the following types of document(s):</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Your submitted Insurance application’s supplementary document(s)</li> 
 <li>Policy servicing request and/or the relevant supplementary document(s)</li> 
 <li>Claim request and/or the relevant supplementary document(s)</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Apart from submitting documents online, can I submit documents via other channels?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can submit your documents at the branch or send it through at the address below.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC Life (International) Limited<br> 18/F, Tower 1, HSBC Centre<br> 1 Sham Mong Road, Kowloon<br> Hong Kong</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Can I retrieve what I’ve previously uploaded?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can't retrieve your uploaded documents but you can refer to the Document Upload Acknowledgement Page for your uploaded document details straight after your upload is complete.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you have any questions about managing your policy, you can call us at:<br> </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>HSBC Life Servicing Hotline: <a href="tel:+852-2583-8000" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 2583 8000</a><br> </li> 
 <li>Premier Elite policyholders Servicing Hotline: <a href="tel:+852-36635911" class="no-link" role="presentation">(852) 3663 5911</a></li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Lines are open every day except on Sundays and public holidays:<br> </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>9am-8pm on weekdays</li> 
 <li>9am-1pm on Saturdays</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How do I know if the documents I’ve uploaded are sufficient?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Please rest assured that we will contact you if we need more information from you.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Am I required to sign on the form before uploading it?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you are uploading the form on the Public Website, you are required to sign on the form. You can electronically sign the form using a touchscreen or touchpad without needing to print or scan it.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you are uploading the form on Personal Internet Banking or HSBC HK Mobile Banking app, please refer to the table below. For requests that require a signature, you can electronically sign the form using a touchscreen or touchpad without needing to print or scan it.</p>
</div></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_52" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>What is the maximum number of documents I can upload each time?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can upload a maximum of 10 documents each time.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Is there a file size restriction?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The maximum file size in total for each upload is 6MB.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Which file formats are supported?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Jpg, png and pdf files are the supported file formats.<br> </p>
</div></div>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_23">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="hsbc-swiftsave"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            HSBC Swift Save Insurance Plan
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_53" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>In what currency will I make my premium payments?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can pay for your premiums in HKD or the policy currency through your HSBC bank account. If you choose the monthly payment option, you can only pay with your HSBC HKD bank account.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_24" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_22" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1102613463__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1102613463__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Other HSBC Swift Save Insurance Plan FAQs </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1102613463__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_56">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_59" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_54" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>What happens at the end of my policy?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">When your policy reaches one month before the maturity, we’ll mail a maturity pre-notice to you regarding the date of the maturity. You can choose your payment option and the currency you would like to receive your maturity benefit in. When the maturity payment is settled, we’ll mail a Maturity Payment Letter to confirm the payment.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Can I change my mind?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Yes, you can. Each policy includes a cooling-off period during which you have the right to cancel the policy and obtain a full refund. The period refers to the earlier of the following:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>21 calendar days after the delivery of your policy</li> 
 <li>21 calendar days after the delivery of a notice informing you about the availability of your policy</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">To cancel your policy, you can mail a signed written notice together with your policy to the following address within the cooling-off period:<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC Life (International) Limited<br> 18/F, Tower 1, HSBC Centre,<br> 1 Sham Mong Road,<br> Kowloon, Hong Kong</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If your cooling-off period has expired and you want to cancel it before the end of your policy term, the refund you receive may be less than the total premiums you have paid.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How can I make a claim?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can call us on (852) 3128 0122 and we can assist you in preparing your claim requests. You can visit our <a href="/insurance/claims/" target="_self">Claims and Assistance Services</a> page for more details.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>When does my policy become effective?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Once your application is approved, you'll be covered by your HSBC Swift Save Insurance Plan starting from the date when you submit your application.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>I pay my premiums by autopay. What should I do if I want to change the account I use for making the payments?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can fill in the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/insurance/life/change-of-premium-instruction.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Change of Premium Instruction form</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Change of Premium Instruction form  This link will open in a new window</span></a> and mail it to the following address:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC Life (International) Limited<br> 18/F, Tower 1, HSBC Centre,<br> 1 Sham Mong Road,<br> Kowloon, Hong Kong</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can also visit <a href="https://insurance.hsbc.com.hk/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">My Insurance homepage</span><span class="visuallyhidden">My Insurance homepage  This link will open in a new window</span></a> to update your autopay settings.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you have any questions, you can also call us at (852) 2233 3130.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How can I update my correspondence address?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can update your address by filling in the <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/insurance/life/change-of-customer-information.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Change of Customer Information form</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Change of Customer Information form  This link will open in a new window</span></a> or call our customer service hotline to receive the forms via fax.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The form can be submitted to your nearest HSBC branch or mailed to the following address:</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC Life (International) Limited<br> 18/F, Tower 1, HSBC Centre,<br> 1 Sham Mong Road,<br> Kowloon, Hong Kong<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>What happens if I miss a premium payment?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">There is a 30-day grace period for premium payments that are due. If you can't make the payment by the end of the grace period, the policy will lapse with effect from the due date of the first unpaid premium.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>What are the risks associated with this product?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In the case that you have to surrender your policy in the early years, you may receive an amount significantly less than the premiums paid. If you have chosen the aggregate premium payment option, we'll apply a surrender charge on the balance of the pre-paid premiums together with interest accumulated upon your policy surrenders.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">When reviewing the numbers in the illustration summary, please note that the cost of living in the future is likely to be higher than today due to inflation.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You'll be subject to the credit risk of HSBC Life (International) Limited and your premiums paid will form part of HSBC Life (International) Limited’s assets. You do not have any rights or ownership over any of these assets. Your recourse is against HSBC Life (International) Limited only. Please refer to the product brochure for more details.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>What happens if my application is not successful and the first payment is already debited from my account?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You'll be notified via SMS if your application is not successful. The first payment will then be refunded within 3 business days to your account from which the payment has been made.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>What if I have question about my application?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Contact us using our Live Chat service on HSBC website or Chat with us service on the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app if you have any questions about your application. Live Chat is available from 10:30am to 10pm, Monday to Friday (except public holidays). Or you can send an email to <a href="mailto:dfv.enquiry@hsbc.com.hk">dfv.enquiry@hsbc.com.hk</a> for further assistance.<br> <br> </p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    

</div>
</div></div>

    <div class="anchor" id="hsbc-ofic"></div>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_57">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_60" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_24">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="hsbc-swiftsave"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            HSBC One cancer coverage FAQs
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_55" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Who is eligible for this insurance coverage?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Customers of HSBC in Hong Kong who have fulfilled all of the following requirements:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>successfully opens or upgrades to an HSBC One integrated account via the HSBC HK App or HSBC Online Banking from 3 July 2023 to 31 December 2023 (both dates inclusive); and</li> 
 <li>be a HKID holder and locates in Hong Kong SAR when opening the HSBC One integrated account; and</li> 
 <li>be aged between 18 and 64 (age at the Eligible Customer’s last birthday) on the date of account opening or upgrade; and</li> 
 <li>whose country of residence is not USA or Japan; and</li> 
 <li>who remains an HSBC integrated account holder during the coverage effective period.</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>When is the benefit cover started and how long is the coverage period (i.e. Coverage Effective Period)?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The coverage will be effective from the HSBC One successful account opening/upgrade date of each eligible customer and last for 15 months (including waiting period). E.g. If account opening date is 1 August 2023, Coverage Effective Period is 1 August 2023 – 31 October 2024.</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_25" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_23" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="624590675__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="624590675__tab0" class="dropdown-text">Other HSBC One cancer coverage FAQs </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="624590675__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_58">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_61" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_56" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Any notice will be sent to customers on coverage details?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The Coverage details and its Coverage Effective Date will usually be sent to 1) the Eligible Customer’s latest email address maintained in HSBC’s record; and 2) via the HSBC HK App Push Notification and In-app banner, after customer successfully opened / upgraded to HSBC One.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Do I need to cancel the policy when the coverage period ends? Will there be automatic deduction for renewal when the coverage period ends?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The plan will be automatically cancelled after the coverage period ends and no money will be deducted from your account for renewal. Of course, you can always seek our <a href="https://appointment.hsbc.com.hk/insurance/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">one-to-one guidance</span><span class="visuallyhidden">one-to-one guidance  This link will open in a new window</span></a> to help you find the right plan to continue your coverage.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How to make a claim?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Go to the <a href="/insurance/forms/" data-pid="PWS_HK_EN_GCDEV2197_1">Insurance Forms & Documents</a> > Claim Forms > <a href="/insurance/forms/#claims-for-hsbc-one-cancer-coverage" data-pid="PWS_HK_EN_C134426_1">Claims for HSBC One cancer coverage</a> to download the claim form and choose one of the following methods:<br> </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Email to <a href="mailto:claims@hsbc.com.hk">claims@hsbc.com.hk</a>; or</li> 
 <li>Upload to <a href="https://insurance.hsbc.com.hk/documents-service/upload-document-pws" target="_blank" data-pid="PWS_HK_EN_GCDEV2197_2" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">Upload Documents</span><span class="visuallyhidden">Upload Documents  This link will open in a new window</span></a> (please enter policy number 00000001).</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">For any claim related enquiries, please call our HSBC Life Claims Hotline at (852) 3128 0122.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Where can I find out more about the cancer coverage?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Feel free to chat with us via LiveChat or call us at (852) 2233 3000. You can also find detailed terms and conditions <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/accounts/products/insurance-for-mass-terms-and-conditions.pdf" target="_blank" data-pid="PWS_HK_EN_GCDEV2197_3" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">here</span><span class="visuallyhidden">here  This link will open in a new window</span></a>.</p>
</div></div>
